about_the_game:
This DLC is intended for players who enjoy the game and want to continue to show their support for the developer and Aerorozvidka, and get some cool extras in the game! The Revenue split from this DLC works similarly as the main game, except 30% goes specifically to Aerorozvidka, instead of our partner Ukrainian charities. After DfA hits break even, 70% will go to Aerorozvidka after this point.

This Skin Pack features three Drone skins and one Operator skin inspired and co-designed by Aerorozvidka

"Aerorozvidka" is an NGO and a team that creates and uses net-centric and robotic military capabilities to enhance Ukraine's security and defense. They specialize in aerial reconnaissance and drone warfare, aiming to improve situational and battlefield awareness and cybersecurity. They design drones and train operators on the best deployment techniques. They are also involved in developing centralized data gathering and processing centers to support Ukraine's security and defense efforts

You can choose the skins from the Drone and Pilot Customization screen before you start a run of the game.

content_descriptors.notes: Main game contains violence such as gunfire and explosions. Depicts dead bodies. Set in a contemporary war scenario (Russian invasion of Ukraine).

detailed_description:

The Revenue split from this DLC works similarly as the main game, except 30% goes specifically to Aerorozvidka, instead of our partner Ukrainian charities. After DfA hits break even, 70% will go to Aerorozvidka after this point.

This Skin Pack features three Drone skins and one Operator skin inspired and co-designed by Aerorozvidka

"Aerorozvidka" is an NGO and a team that creates and uses net-centric and robotic military capabilities to enhance Ukraine's security and defense. They specialize in aerial reconnaissance and drone warfare, aiming to improve situational and battlefield awareness and cybersecurity. They design drones and train operators on the best deployment techniques. They are also involved in developing centralized data gathering and processing centers to support Ukraine's security and defense efforts

You can choose the skins from the Drone and Pilot Customization screen before you start a run of the game.

short_description: Join the fight for Ukraine’s sovereignty and democracy and support DfA and Aerorozvidka with this pack of exclusive skins Co-designed with Aerorozvidka! Wear the colors of the brave warriors who stand against Russian aggression!
supported_languages: English, Ukrainian, Polish, Belarusian, French, German, Japanese, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Finnish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Georgian, Turkish
